sentences.en: According to Xun Zi's utopia all under heaven submits to one ruler.
sentences.cn: 荀子的 “ 理想国”是天下定于一尊,万民匍匐于地.

sentences.en: Everyone has a dream that one day they can reach Utopia.
sentences.cn: 每个人都憧憬着终有一天能够到达理想乡.

sentences.en: For many customers yesterday, New Yansha was indeed a kind of utopia.
sentences.cn: 对昔日的许多消费者而言, 新燕莎的确堪称乌托邦.

sentences.en: His Utopia is not a chimerical commonwealth but a practical improvement on what already exists.
sentences.cn: 他的乌托邦不是空想的联邦,而是对那些已经存在的联邦事实上的改进.

sentences.en: I've turned that bloody maniac loose upon utopia.
sentences.cn: 我把个十足的恶棍送到了乌托邦.

sentences.en: Margaret embarked upon the route to Utopia straightaway.
sentences.cn: 玛格丽特立即就为实现这个理想而开始奋斗.

sentences.en: Sir Thomas More is remembered today as the author of Utopia.
sentences.cn: 当今,托马斯·莫尔先生还被铭记为《乌托邦》的作者.

sentences.en: Sir Thomas More is remembered today as the author of Utopia.
sentences.cn: 当今，托马斯·莫尔先生还被铭记为乌托邦的作者。

sentences.en: Such a complete satisfaction of human need is utopia.
sentences.cn: 这种对人类需要的完全满足是空想的.

sentences.en: That fake fur was a poor choice to infiltrate utopia?
sentences.cn: 选择穿假皮草来渗透这个乌托邦是个错误?

sentences.en: The British utopia literature undergoes the process of utopia, mock - utopia and dystopia.
sentences.cn: 英国的乌托邦文学经历了乌托邦 、 讽刺乌托邦和反乌托邦的发展.

sentences.en: The concluding part explores the fate of Utopia at the present age.
sentences.cn: 本文最后的结语部分探讨了乌托邦的当代命运.

sentences.en: The harmoniousness talked in Utopia written by Plato includs two aspects.
sentences.cn: 和谐的本体论意义是指人的生存行为对罗各斯的服从.

sentences.en: Utopia: Fantasia. Fantasia. This is Utopia. How do you read me?
sentences.cn: 理想国: 幻想曲. 幻想曲. 这里是理想国. 我的信号你收得到 吗 ?

sentences.en: We weren't out to design a contemporary utopia.
sentences.cn: 我们不想去设计一个当代乌托邦。

sentences.en: When Vida came in to tea Carol sketched her Utopia.
sentences.cn: 维达来喝茶的时候,卡萝尔就情不自禁把她的乌托邦扼要地说了一下.

trans.tran_cn: 乌托邦（理想中美好的社会）
trans.tran_en: an imaginary perfect world where everyone is happy
